title: black screen cant create game
body:
I try starting a game and this is what it looks like.  
game modes like aram/3v3 works and instantly goes to que, but at the screen to select a role this is what i see, for draft and ranked.

even asked a friend.

replies.body:
Draft Modes require a super stable connection to the server, and black screens are typically an indication that there's a drop off somewhere before your connection hits the server. This can happen for a number of reasons, but local network settings or routing issues to the server are the most common, which our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) can help you address.

Let me know if you still have issues with this after taking those steps.

um..... it's an issue with only this most recent patch of yours i'm having an issue. I've played since season 2 just fine, and have good ping.

I can't even join hexakill, because when it pops up the match found i click accept, then it's a black screen, so i exit but it says i will receive a time penalty. Ping is 25ms

Patches only modify local files inside your League directory, therefore they're **extremely unlikely** to impact your connection at all. In order to rule out the easy fixes, I definitely recommend giving the steps in that guide a go.

Let me know the results.
